doc:
Michael Bentine https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Bentine 0 Michael Bentine, CBE (born Michael James Bentin; 26 January 1922 – 26 November 1996) was an English comedian, comic actor and founding member of the Goons. He was a Peruvian Briton. In 1971, Bentine received the Order of Merit of Peru following his fund-raising work for the 1970 Great Peruvian earthquake. Michael_Bentine , CBE ( born Michael_James_Bentin ; 26_January_1922 – 26_November_1996 ) was an_English_comedian , comic_actor and founding member of the_Goons . He was a_Peruvian_Briton . In 1971 , Bentine received the_Order of Merit of Peru following his_fund-raising_work for the_1970_Great_Peruvian_earthquake .
